Sentencas: Critical issues of electrophoretic deposition (EPD) and its potential for fabricating high-performance ceramics are reviewed.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Deposition kinetics under constant-current and constant-voltage conditions are discussed.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The process of submonolayer formation of mono-sized silica particles as a function of deposition time during EPD has been discussed and is shown to have a remarkable similarity with the atomic thin-film growth (10000 times smaller scale) process of Molecular Beam Epitaxial (MBE) process.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Ceramic coatings by EPD are described and strategies to avoid cracking are outlined.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Discussion on avoiding cracking using the Reaction Bonded Aluminium Oxide (RBAO) process is also described.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The versatility of the EPD process towards fabrication of a wide spectrum of composite microstructures is discussed together with references.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Potential use of EPD in the fabrication of Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (muSOFC) has also been discussed.
Titulo: Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition
Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition
Synthesis and microstructural manipulation of ceramics by electrophoretic deposition
